snippet.title: Lux Ex: a Cyberspace Shooter (Alpha) Gameplay
snippet.description: In Lux Ex, you find yourself on a cyberpunk enviroment, entering the cyberspace to try and undertake an initiation challenge from the ancient order of technomages. Connecting your brains to a video game cartrige, you face hordes of elemental shadow monsters and corrupted data inside a virtual representation of your consciousness.
